title: Murder she said
creator_credit: George Pollock, George H. Brown and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: Based upon the novel “4.50 from Paddington” by Agatha Christie also published as “What Mrs McGillicuddy Saw!” Dozing in her seat as the train leaves Paddington Station, Miss Jane Marple awakens to witness a strangulation aboard a passing train. The police do not believe her but undaunted, Miss Marple takes a job as a domestic in an attempt to discover the truth. Starring Margaret Rutherford, Arthur Kennedy, Muriel Pavlow and James Robertson Justice.
